Lebowski.TextModel.TextBoxTextContext

Lebowski.TextModel.TextBoxTextContext Class Reference

TextBoxTextContext is a text context that is linked with a standard WinForms TextBox. It does not currently support display of remote selections. More...

Detailed Description

TextBoxTextContext is a text context that is linked with a standard WinForms TextBox. It does not currently support display of remote selections.
